sect1.title: BITXOR
sect1.para: Return the bitwise exclusive or of the the two integer arguments.

itemizedlist.para: <lhs> - Left-hand value. Must be an integer
<rhs> - Right-hand value. Must be an integer

sect2.title: Returns
sect2.para: Returns the bitwise exclusive or of two arguments. The type of the result is that of the widest argument.

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: make “foo 12 ; TODO: Provide a way to specify values in other radixes (radices?) make “bar bitxor :foo 15 ; bar == 3 make “foo bitxor :bar 3 ; foo == 0
